inputs.name: deployment_name
inputs.description: Name of the HPC deployment, used as name of the filestore instace if no name is specified.

inputs.name: filestore_share_name
inputs.description: Name of the file system share on the instance.

inputs.name: filestore_tier
inputs.description: The service tier of the instance.

inputs.name: labels
inputs.description: Labels to add to the filestore instance. List key, value pairs.

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: The resource name of the instance.

inputs.name: network_name
inputs.description: The name of the GCE VPC network to which the instance is connected.

inputs.name: zone
inputs.description: The name of the Filestore zone of the instance.
